== Mokeri (CT) (627286) ==

Mokeri (CT) is a town in the [[Thalassery]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 10.53 sq. km. and harbouring 4292 households with total population of 19684 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 22 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 500 km. Male population is 9039 and female population is 10645. Scheduled Caste population is 197 and Scheduled Tribes population is 21. Census Location Code of the town is 627286<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 86 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 83 km. Railway station is at Thalassery at a distance of 15 km.
